name: gitlab-mcp-server
description: GitLab MCP Server with GraphQL discovery and schema introspection
author: Your Name <your.email@example.com>

GITLAB_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: GitLab personal access token with read_api or api scope

GITLAB_MAX_PAGE_SIZE.description: Maximum page size for paginated queries (1-100)

tools.name: get_current_user
tools.description: Get information about the current authenticated GitLab user

tools.name: get_projects
tools.description: List projects accessible to the current user with pagination support

tools.name: get_project
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific GitLab project by full path

tools.name: get_issues
tools.description: Get issues from a specific GitLab project with pagination support

tools.name: get_merge_requests
tools.description: Get merge requests from a specific GitLab project with pagination support

tools.name: create_issue
tools.description: Create a new issue in a GitLab project

tools.name: create_merge_request
tools.description: Create a new merge request in a GitLab project

tools.name: execute_custom_query
tools.description: Execute custom GraphQL queries against the GitLab API

tools.name: get_available_queries
tools.description: Get list of available GraphQL queries and mutations from schema introspection
